data.message: Dear Facebook, Please change the profile pic uploader to a crop free one, You are limiting the users' creatively taken pictures, Please try to understand! WE WANT CROP FREE PROFILE PIC!!!

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Rafat! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
Thank you very much, i appreciate your cooperation
